author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
The Fedora Flatpak repo is a weird thing that unless you're on Fedora you probably never think about but for those who are especially on Workstation the ordering of the repos has caused a lot of issues for people over the years and still does today.
